issue.title: Allow creating ParquetPartition from external crate
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11435](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11435). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Without this functionality, it's not possible to implement table provider in external crate that targets parquet format since ParquetExec takes ParquetPartition as an argument.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11435?focusedCommentId=17277419) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9369
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9369>
